name: European Association for the Consumption-based billing of Energy Costs
goal:
The E.V.V.E. is an independent and Europe-wide politically active interest grouping whose activities aim at the promotion of systems to save energy and water in buildings. In the preamble of the constitution it reads:

Considering the idea of a further improvement of the economical and efficient energy use in Europe the companies undersigned join together to a European Interest Grouping. In this connection the Europe-wide introduction of the consumption-based billing of energy costs is to the fore.

Amongst their members are leading companies developing and producing systems for heat and water cost allocation as well as carrying out the service for the consumption-based billing of energy and water costs within the European Union and beyond.

The E.V.V.E. is currently represented in 14 companies and two associated organisations in 9 member states of the European Union.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Single market
euInitiatives: Energy Efficiency Directive, Measuring Instruments Directive, Data Protection, Energy Performance of Buildings Directive, Energy Union, Governance, ePrivacy, Ecodesign, EU strategy for long-term emission reductions
